ModMetaData.name: Cyber's Miniaturization
ModMetaData.author: Cyber
ModMetaData.description:
Enables miniaturization (uninstall/reinstall) for several non-furniture items.
Known Bugs: The mini-fied door sprite only shows half a door. This is due to how Rimworld draws doors. Reinstalling an installed door can throw an error when the door is minified. No idea why, it seems to be a harmless error. This is only seen when in debug mode.
Compatibility: This is a simple XML mod and should be easily compatible with already existing saves.
If you plan to remove the mod: BE SURE TO REINSTALL OR DECONSTRUCT ANY MINI VERSIONS OF THE ABOVE BUILDINGS!
